item.description: Distance marker on NV-361 north. Distance to Fallon (via US-50 West) and Austin (via US-50 East).

item.title: NV-361 North - Gabbs
item.description: Entering Gabbs on NV-361 North. Elevation 4630 Feet.

item.title: US-95 South/US-6 East at US-95/US-6 Split
item.description: US-95 South/US-6 East at US-95/US-6 split in Tonopah.

item.title: US-95 South/US-6 East at US-95/US-6 Split
item.description: US-95 South/US-6 East at US-95/US-6 split in Tonopah. Use US-6 East for Ely and Austin (via NV-376). Use US-95 South for Las Vegas.

item.title: US-95 South/US-6 East Approaching US-95/US-6 Split
item.description: US-95 South/US-6 East approaching US-95/US-6 Split in Tonopah.

item.title: US-95 North - Tonopah
item.description: Entering Tonopah on US-95 North - Elevation 6030 Feet. Tonopah is the unincorporated county seat of Nye County.

item.title: US-95 North At US-6
item.description: US-95 north at US-96. Use US-6 east for Ely. Use US-95 north/US-6 west for Bishop (California) and Reno. US-6 joins US-95 north to Coaldale Junction.

item.title: US-6 West At US-95
item.description: US-6 west at US-95. Use US-95 south for Las Vegas and Goldfield. Use US-95 north/US-6 west for Bishop (California) and Reno. US-6 joins US-95 north to Coaldale Junction.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching US-95
item.description: US-6 west approaching US-95 junction in Tonopah. US-6 west joins US-95 north to Coaldale Junction.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Tonopah, Bishop (California), and Las Vegas (via US-95).

item.title: US-6 West at NV-376 North
item.description: US-6 West at NV-376 North in Nye County.

item.title: US-6 West at NV-376 North
item.description: US-6 West at NV-376 North to Austin. Continue west on US-6 for Tonopah.

item.description: US-6 West approaching NV-375 North in Nye County.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Tonopah and Bishop (California). This is the first appearance of Bishop as a control city on US-6 westbound.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching NV-379
item.description: US-6 West approaching NV-379 north to Duckwater. Continue west on US-6 for Tonopah.

item.title: US-6 West - Nye County
item.description: Entering Nye County on US-6 West. Nye County is the largest county by area in Nevada and the third largest by area in the United States.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching US-95
item.description: US-6 west approaching US-95. Use US-95 south for Las Vegas and Goldfield. Use US-95 north/US-6 west for Bishop (California) and Reno. US-6 joins US-95 north to Coaldale Junction.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching US-95
item.description: US-6 west approaching US-95 junction in Tonopah.

item.title: NV-376 South Approaching US-6
item.description: NV-376 South approaching US-6 in Nye County. Turn left for Ely; right for Tonopah.

item.title: NV-376 South Approaching US-6
item.description: NV-376 south approaching US-6. This is the southern end of NV-376.

item.title: NV-376 South at NV-377
item.description: NV-376 south at NV-377. Use NV-377 east for Manhattan and Belmont.
